EmailTemplate.name: No request ( English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr / Ms {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you very much for contacting DuPont.
We have received the contact details you have included in DuPont.com form, but there's no request provided.
If you need information on any of our products, please let us know and one of our representatives will contact you.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38
Phone : 0034 985 12 3773
Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37
E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
